description: Destruct traffic as match as you can!!\n

10.description: This is the description for graph States
10.name: States

13.description:
This state takes care of the starting screen:
- Freezes the vehicles
- Plays the camera animation
- Shows the start UI
- Plays the start countdown
13.name: SimpleStartScreen

16.description:
This scenario sets up the scenario:
- Loads the level
- Spawns the vehicles
- Blacklists some actions
16.name: SimpleScenarioSetup

20.description:
This end screen shows up if the player wins




You, Win! :)
20.name: endScreen - Success

pins: Attempt Data for other nodes to process
If this attempt will unlock next mission etc.
If this attempt got the best score and considers the mission completed.

data.expression: (a and not b) or (b and not a)

25.description:
This state resets the scenario:
- Vehicles are reset and moved to their starting positions
- AI is disabled
25.name: SimpleResetVehicle

57.description: This is the description for graph New State
57.name: Exit State

203.description: This is the description for graph New State
203.name: New State

name: [Mission] Destruction
